Class NetworkService

java.lang.Object
ducknetwork.service.NetworkService
public class NetworkService extends Object
Service layer for DuckSocialNetwork (Lab 2).

Provides higher-level operations and business logic on top of the Repo repository. Responsible for validating inputs for operations that span multiple repository calls and for computing graph-related metrics such as connected components and diameters.

    • NetworkService

      public NetworkService()

  • Method Details

    • addFriend

      public void addFriend(Long id1, Long id2)
      Adds a bidirectional friendship between two users, with validation.
      Parameters:
      id1 - first user ID; must not be null
      id2 - second user ID; must not be null and not equal to id1
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if either id is null or both ids are equal
      DomainExceptions.UserNotFoundException - if one of the users does not exist in the repository

    • removeFriend

      public void removeFriend(Long id1, Long id2)
      Removes a friendship bidirectionally between two users.
      Parameters:
      id1 - first user ID
      id2 - second user ID
      Throws:
      DomainExceptions.UserNotFoundException - if one of the users does not exist

    • numberOfCommunities

      public int numberOfCommunities()
      Calculates the number of connected components (communities) in the friendship graph.
      Returns:
      number of connected components

    • getCommunities

      public List<List<User>> getCommunities()
      Returns all communities (connected components) in the social graph.
      Returns:
      list of communities, each community is a List of User

    • mostSociableCommunity

      public List<User> mostSociableCommunity()
      Finds the most sociable community, defined as the one with the largest diameter (the maximum of shortest paths within the component).
      Returns:
      list of users in the most sociable community; returns an empty list if no users
